import React from "react"; function BotSpecs({ bot, addToArmy }) { const handleEnlist = () => { addToArmy(bot); }; const handleGoBack = () => { // Handle going back to the list view from the parent component }; return (

Name: {bot.name}

Catchphrase: {bot.catchphrase}

Class: {bot.bot_class}
{bot.health}
{bot.damage}
{bot.armor}
); } export default BotSpecs;
